text: haey chea karpit nasa you so hv ban neamk aoy puok anak nouv phosdo tang da chbasaleasa cheachraen tangpi moun( mou sa) mk mlih te puok anak nowte meankar sangsay ampi avei delke ban noam vea mk aoy puok anak ddel . louh nowpel delke ban slab puok anak bercha niyeay tha a l laoh nung min chattang anakneasar na mneak banteabpi ke towvinh . dauchnaoh der a l laoh thveu aoy v nge v ng champoh anaknea del chea anak bampean chea anak sangsay
